page.title: 01 AREA OF SQUARE
page.content: This block lies in an area of one of the most beautiful parts of Britain. It forms part of the {'Howe of Cromar' (Valley of Cromar) and lies some 52 kilometres west of Aberdeen. The block extends from the western extremity of the village of Tarland westwars towards the hamlet of Logie Coldstone and Northwards to the scattered hamlet of Migvie. The area is very rural and consists almost entirely of arable farmland. There is also a little woodland cover both of pine and deciduos trees.Within the area there are three country houses with surrounding estates.The farms are almost entirely contained within the estate of the {MacRobert {Trust}which at the time of writing is offering its farms for sale and/or tenancy.
